description: Their Men’s Hike Light Cushion Print sock combines comfort with sporty fashion. With a performance-oriented fit, specific mesh zones for breathability, and a Virtually Seamless™ toe, this sock also offers all the benefits of Merino wool blended with recycled nylon: temperature regulation, odor resistance, and sustainably minded durability. And its eye-catching print, which encourages all to “hike how you like,” brings style to the trail. With light cushioning on the entire bottom of the foot, this sock will help you go far and feel good doing it.
name: Smartwool Hike Light Cushion Print Crew Socks - Mens
